name: Cryptography
description: Perform cryptographic tasks like hashing and encryption.

conditions.name: On hash finished
conditions.description: Triggered when a hash action with a matching tag has finished.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the hash operation that finished.

conditions.name: On encryption finished
conditions.description: Triggered when an encryption action with a matching tag has finished.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the encryption operation that finished.

conditions.name: On encryption failed
conditions.description: Triggered when an encryption action with a matching tag fails to complete.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the encryption operation that failed.

conditions.name: On decryption finished
conditions.description: Triggered when a decryption action with a matching tag has finished.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the decryption operation that finished.

conditions.name: On decryption failed
conditions.description: Triggered when a decryption action with a matching tag fails to complete.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the decryption operation that failed.

conditions.name: On any hash finished
conditions.description: Triggered when any hash action finishes. The 'Tag' expression identifies the action.

conditions.name: On any encryption finished
conditions.description: Triggered when any encryption action finishes. The 'Tag' expression identifies the action.

conditions.name: On any encryption failed
conditions.description: Triggered when any encryption action fails. The 'Tag' expression identifies the action.

conditions.name: On any decryption finished
conditions.description: Triggered when any decryption action finishes. The 'Tag' expression identifies the action.

conditions.name: On any decryption failed
conditions.description: Triggered when any encryption action fails. The 'Tag' expression identifies the action.

actions.name: Hash binary
actions.description: Calculate the hash of the contents of a Binary Data object.

params.name: Binary data
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object to hash the contents of.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify different hashing operations.

actions.name: Encrypt binary
actions.description: Encrypt the contents of a Binary Data object with a password.
actions.display_text: Encrypt {0} with algorithm [i]{1}[/i] password [i]{2}[/i] ([i]{3}[/i] iterations, tag [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Source
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object with the data to encrypt.

params.name: Password
params.description: The password to encrypt the data with (case sensitive).

params.name: Iterations
params.description: Number of times to repeat hash function when generating key. Higher values are slower but more secure.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify different encryption operations.

actions.name: Decrypt binary
actions.description: Decrypt the contents of a Binary Data object with a password.

params.name: Source
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object with the data to decrypt.

params.name: Password
params.description: The password to decrypt the data with (case sensitive).

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify different decryption operations.

expressions.name: Hash
expressions.description: Hexadecimal string of a resulting hash.

expressions.name: Tag
expressions.description: Tag of a corresponding action in a trigger.

expressions.name: RandomUUID
expressions.description: Generate a v4 UUID using a cryptographically secure random number generator.
